caption.p: Crop calorie yield (in Gcal ha −1) simulated for the historic and the +2°C period with the BAU scenario (blue and red crossbars, respectively); mean and 5th to 95th percentile ranges are plotted. Numbers below crossbars represent mean yield change in Gcal ha −1 and % relative to the historic baseline. All changes are statistically significant (the paired t‐test p < .001)—more details in Table S3 in the Supporting Information S1.
